bop_portrait;Larachel
speak;Larachel;Oh my!|Would you look at that fine specimen over there, Tana!|Such strong shoulders!
bop_portrait;Tana
speak;Tana;L'Arachel!|Please lower your voice.|People can hear you.
speak;Larachel;Why should I be quiet?|There's no shame in admiring the divine craftsmanship|that went into creating such magnificent men!
bop_portrait;Larachel
speak;Larachel;Look at that one loading crates!|And that mercenary by the tavern!|Oh!|And that sailor tying knots!
speak;Tana;I didn't realize you were so...|interested in men, L'Arachel.
speak;Larachel;A princess must always be aware of potential suitors!|One day, I shall need a consort worthy of Rausten's throne.
bop_portrait;Larachel
speak;Larachel;Tell me, Tana.|What sort of man catches your royal eye?|Tall?|Muscular?|Scholarly?|Rugged?
speak;Tana;I don't think this is an appropriate conversation to have|in the middle of a busy port!
speak;Larachel;Nonsense!|This is precisely the right place.|So many examples to reference!
expression;Larachel;NormalBlink
speak;Larachel;Do you prefer a man of action like that sailor?|Or perhaps someone refined, like a noble merchant?
expression;Tana;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Tana;I... well...|There's already someone I...|Never mind.
speak;Larachel;Oho!|So there IS someone!|You must tell me everything!
speak;Larachel;Is it someone in our army?|A knight perhaps?|Or maybe a certain prince?
speak;Tana;L'Arachel, please!|I'd rather not discuss this.
speak;Larachel;My dear Tana, you mustn't be shy about these matters!|How will you know he's the right one|if you haven't compared him to others?
expression;Larachel;NoSmile
speak;Larachel;Marriage is a divine covenant, blessed by the heavens themselves!|It must not be entered into without thorough consideration.
speak;Tana;I'm not thinking about marriage yet!|We're in the middle of a war!
speak;Larachel;Wars end, Tana.|And when peace comes, so do proposals!
speak;Larachel;Tell me, what qualities do you seek in a husband?|Is he brave?|Loyal?|Handsome?|Does he make your heart flutter?
expression;Tana;CloseEyes
speak;Tana;He's...kind.|And brave, yes.|
expression;Tana;Smile
speak;Tana;But mostly, he cares deeply for others.
speak;Tana;He puts others before himself, always.|Sometimes to a fault.
expression;Larachel;Smile
speak;Larachel;That's a fine start!|But what of his lineage?|His prospects?|His faith and devotion to the divine?
expression;Tana;NoSmile
speak;Tana;I...haven't really thought about those things.|Does it matter so much?
speak;Larachel;Of course it matters!|A marriage is not just between two hearts,|but between two families, two legacies!
speak;Larachel;Take it from me, dear Tana.|There are many handsome, brave men in our army alone!|Don't settle on one without knowing what else awaits you.
speak;Tana;But when you know in your heart...
speak;Larachel;The heart can be fickle and easily swayed!|That's why we must test it!|See if it remains true when presented with alternatives.
speak;Larachel;I say this as your friend.|You deserve someone who makes you truly happy.|Someone worthy of Frelia's lovely princess.
speak;Tana;I...
expression;Tana;NormalBlink
speak;Tana;Perhaps you have a point.|I've been so focused on one person...
speak;Larachel;Exactly!|Open your eyes to the possibilities!|The divine works in mysterious ways.
expression;Larachel;Smile
speak;Larachel;Now, I must be off!|Uncle Mansel would want me to survey the port|for any signs of monsters or unholy creatures.
speak;Larachel;Think on what I've said, dear Tana!|And keep your royal eyes open!|You never know when the perfect match might appear!

speak;Tana;Could I be too focused?|Am I certain about what I want?|Who I want?
speak;Tana;*sighs*|L'Arachel certainly knows how to complicate things.|Even matters of the heart...
